articles.author: Sean Conlon, Sarah Min
articles.title: Dow tumbles nearly 600 points, S&P 500 goes negative for 2026 in tech sector rout: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Wall Street is coming off a major sell-off in software stocks that drove the S&P 500 to a second straight day of losses.
articles.content:
U.S. equities fell for another session on Thursday as investors took a risk-off stance, leading popular trades in technology and bitcoin to unravel.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average shed about 592.5… [+3590 chars]

articles.title: Google hints at big AirDrop expansion for Android "very soon" - Ars Technica
articles.description: AirDrop came to the Pixel 10 last year, and more Android phones will join the party in 2026.

articles.author: Andrew Dunn, Kyle LaHucik
articles.title: What Eikon’s modest IPO says about the future of big-money, big-name biotech - Endpoints News
articles.description: Eikon Therapeutics IPOs at $971M valuation, down nearly 75% from peak, raising $381M despite Nobel Prize science backing and leadership by ex-Merck exec Roger Perlmutter.
articles.content:
For Eikon Ther­a­peu­tics, its IPO feels more like some­thing its sur­viv­ing rather than cel­e­brat­ing.
 The Bay Area start­up is one of biotechs most promi­nent pri­vate­ly
